title: La Marmite - temporarily closed
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Juice bar, Beer/Wine
description: Vegetarian restaurant with vegan options. You can eat either the main dish or a menu and choose to pay either 4€ (min.), 8€ (medium) or 10€ (support the cause). Tap water is free. Drinks include freshly squeezed juices, tea, coffee, (local) beer, wine. Kitchen managed by groups of people that each work for a different non-profit organization. Reportedly closed for a remodel / restructuring - Sept 2014. Please update HappyCow of changes.
